constituent: test, say, words, keitai, mouth, style, arrow, craft
heisigStory: When a manufacturer produces a new style for the market, the first thing that is done is to run a test on consumers, asking them to speak their opinions frankly about the product. Never mind the anachronism (the kanji was there well before our capitalistic market system) if it helps you remember.
hint: kiểm tra. những lời nói phong cách cần kiểm tra
koohiiStory1: In an essay test, you are judged on both your choice of words and your writing style.
koohiiStory2: The Japanese oral exam was a test of my speaking style.
myStory: kiểm tra. những lời nói phong cách cần kiểm tra
readingExamples: 試みる (こころ.みる), 試す (ため.す)
